strapiPost.title: Small Business To Open In Downtown Rogers Friday
strapiPost.content:
The streets of Downtown Rogers are filling up with creatives adding to the local small business charm. 

  • Creatives on the block: Cirro Studio is opening this Friday, April 8, on 103 W Chestnut St next to Nolaâ€™s Pantry. Cirro Studio will be a handcrafted fine furniture and home goods store with the mission of inspiring the feeling of home with its products.
  • Grand opening: The studio will be open until 6p on opening day, and through a collaboration with Mavis WineCo., there will be a sip and shop experience from 3-6p.

Sip some wine and see the newest addition to the Downtown Rogers creative community, HERE.
